Articles.Content: Though i am not new to mod making, i am however new to modding ksp, in other words, with unity, ive been wanting to make a mod and now ive decided to sit down and learn as i go (mod like i fly in ksp) but from what i have heard, ksp is about to go to unity 5 but currently isnt, would it matter if i made a mod in U5 for ksp before its on U5? or will i have to make the mod in the same version of unity as ksp? may be a stupid question but as i said before, im new to the whole 3D modeling and unity modding.
Unity 4.2.2 is the best version for KSP currently.

> 
> Unity 4.2.2 is the best version for KSP currently.

cheers!
